sentences.en: “The Coffee houses particularly are very commodious for a free Conversation, and for reading at an easie Rate all manner of printed News,” noted one observer.
sentences.cn: “尤其是咖啡馆，是一个非常宽敞的自由交谈之处，来阅读与评论形形色色的印刷新闻”，一个观察员指出。

sentences.en: “The Coffee houses particularly are very commodious for a free Conversation, and for reading at an easie Rate all manner of printed News,” noted one observer.
sentences.cn: 一名观察家说，“尤其是咖啡馆，因其宽敞开阔的空间，很适合人们进行自由交谈，还可以舒舒服服的阅读各种新闻印刷品”。
宽敞的, 干净的, 和明亮的环境.

sentences.en: Accidentally, I came across a cicada slough. I was really content with its commodious and safe place.
sentences.cn: 无意中找到了一只蝉蜕，它壳内宽敞又安全的空间让我十分满意。

sentences.en: Designed as cruisers, many ketches are heavier, more stable in sea conditions, and more commodious down below.
sentences.cn: 因为它们生来就是为了远行之用，因此它们通常更重，在各种海洋状况下更稳定， 船舱也更宽敞。
客房宽敞舒适且陈设考究。

sentences.en: His house is spacious and commodious, and furnish with profusion and elegance.
sentences.cn: 他的房子宽敞而便利, 布置得富丽优雅.

sentences.en: It was a commodious and a diverting life.
sentences.cn: 这是一种自由自在,令人赏心悦目的生活.

sentences.en: Open whereas commodious yard outside can serve as privately owned outdoors ground, also can become privately owned temporary parking lot for banquet guests.
sentences.cn: 空旷而宽敞的庭院外，可作为私家户外休闲活动的场地，亦可成为私家宴会的客宾临时停车场。
我们家住的地方很宽余.

sentences.en: Rooms are commodious, comfortaBle and airy, each with a specious roofed Balcony overlooking the sea.
sentences.cn: 客房宽大 、 舒适,空气新鲜, 有宽敞带顶的阳台,间间面向大海.

sentences.en: The students' cupboards are very commodious.
sentences.cn: 学生们的橱柜非常宽敞。

sentences.en: Their habitation was not merely respectable and commodious, but even dignified and imposing.
sentences.cn: 他们的居所既宽敞舒适又尊严气派.

sentences.en: There are 15 villas, total 228 suites with deluxe view of mountain and ocean commodious balcony.
sentences.cn: 酒店15幢别墅共有228间多款豪华山海景礼佛客房,每间客房可将远近的山光海色、园林景致尽收眼底.

trans.tran_en: a house or room that is commodious is very big
